Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett predicts the Los Angeles Angels to win against the Chicago White Sox, citing Jose Suarez's recent performance and Davis Martin's struggles.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Angels and the Chicago White Sox meet in a three-game series, with the Angels looking to bounce back from a 3-2 loss in the first game.
Others: Taylor Ward has recorded at least one hit in each of the Angels' last 11 road games
Taylor Ward has hit a home run in two of the Angels' last three road games against the White Sox
Anthony Rendon has recorded at least one RBI in five of his last six appearances with his team as a road favorite against AL Central opponents
